cheap plastic, average product. sound distorted high volume.edit: after 1 year usage.the headphone start developing crack overhead plastic band, padding earcups head band started coming off. the boat logo completely vanished (all happened even taking utmost care). the sound still fine.please aware cheap plastic poor built quality headphone. instead buy blaupunkt bh01 eqz headphone best price.ps. the gold plating aux cable come creating much disturbance connecting listening music rendering useless.edit: the sound cut-offs annoying watching film playing. you can't hear dialogue low volume.honest review 46 day usage...pros:• good sound quality, vocal crystal clear. nice see aux cable bundled box itself.• you get rich bass bluetooth average bass using wired connection.• the ear cup padded good quality foam faux leather, pain continuous use (used 2-2.5 hour still comfortable).• value money, got 1099/- only.• not bass heavy tweak setting get good bass.• good fit design.• good battery backup, got 7 hrs+ single charge. full charge take 2-3 hours, orange led go fully charged.• build quality good considering price product.• call quality average (the speaker loud). the headphone also tell caller’s number incoming call.• the latency also acceptable price point.cons:• on bluetooth, volume kept low music low pitch, sometimes left-right speaker turn on off automatically. (it eliminated keeping volume bar 50%, also problem connected using aux cable). i saw problem boat rockerz 450 well.• when kept 100% volume sound tends get distorted. (its thd-total harmonic distortion ≤5%, whereas good headphone ≤1%)• the aux cable seems thin careful handling it.• the earcups sweat resistant take care it.
